review: I truly LOVE ROKU !!! I  would recommend it to anyone who would listen to me. The price is right the selections are great 100% satisfied.
author: Kim Adossa

review: def. worth it. specially the time warner cable app
author: salvador

review: I have been using chromecast for years and recently bought this one for a special need. Roku is great and really wish i could have got this a while back. It is far more better than chromecast.
author: Karthick

review: It's exactly what it's supposed to be. There are a few "channels" you can get for free but the majority are subscription based like hulu  or netfix.
author: ollie

review: It was great. So easy to use
author: Denise Roller

review: Works great, easy to install, does what it says it will with no problems.
author: cragusa23

review: Have had trouble getting this wi-fi stick to connect. Had to try several router points. I have more than one router. It finally connected. Also remote range is not good. Thinking of sending it back
author: J. Perez
